abstract: Hoping to increase the number of visitors to New York City during the usually slow period after the December holidays, the city's tourism agency announced a partnership with the city of Seoul and Korean Air.
snippet: Hoping to increase the number of visitors to New York City during the usually slow period after the December holidays, the city's tourism agency announced a partnership with the city of Seoul and Korean Air.
lead_paragraph: Hoping to increase the number of visitors to New York City during the usually slow period after the December holidays, the city's tourism agency announced a partnership with the city of Seoul and Korean Air on Tuesday.

headline.main: Promoting More Visits Between Korea and New York
